channel.title: Turning into a NPC
channel.description:
I was wondering, how do you turn into a NPC. What is the command?
If I need to add a line of code or two, please tell me what and where to put it.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 16, 2006, 09:06:09 PM[/size][hr]Does anyone know how to do this?

item.title: Turning into a NPC
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

what you do is you go to the place where all the commands. First, find this:

/*END OF FRAME TESTING*/

Then, Underneath it, but above the next command, paste this

else if (command.startsWith("unpc")) { isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.startsWith("pnpc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } }

Now, try it. open up moparscape and type ::pnpc [here, you type an npc id]
Say ::pnpc 50 for kbd.

If you want to not be an npc anymore, then just type ::unpc

Read full topic

item.title: Turning into a NPC
item.dc:creator: @rent-a-retard rent-a-retard
item.description:
@rent-a-retard wrote:

You do ::pnpc [number].

example, ::pnpc 364 turns you into the king i thinkâ€¦but I think you need admin.

Read full topic
